Text:
To the uploader:  Thank you!  :)  *pets*... Please don't let the nay-sayers discourage you. There are obviously many of us who appreciate the work you are doing.  Sure would be nice if more of them would say so though.                                                             

-AND- in the spirit of the british....                                                            

josvaz:  shuddup ya WANKER.  If you had taken just 5 minutes to download a snippet of one of these files and checked it in VLC media player, you would have seen they are genuine and nice quality.  If you don't know enough, to know how to do this, then you obviously have NO business howling "...fake..."  I suggest you keep your opinions to yourself until you know WTF you are talking about.                                                                                                                                    *sweet smiles*  TA!
This is the real thing but its eps 23 and 24 not 21

Thanks again to the uploader. A10 V10 - as always! Nice fast download and plays easily with most quality players. Please don't be discouraged by the idiots - there are many of us who appreciate what you are doing.

So, uploader, why are these in .mov?  I mean, I've uploaded videos myself, even one from a VHS, and I turned it into an .avi.  Once you get the hang of it, it's not difficult.
